entities.name: professor trelawney
entities.description: Professor Trelawney is the Divination teacher who whirled around as Harry let out a snort of laughter.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the student who let out a snort of laughter and had a teacup snatched from him by Professor Trelawney.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is Harry's friend who had his cup snatched by Professor Trelawney.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is the student who spoke to a teacher like that before and mentioned that everyone knows about Harry and You-Know-Who.

entities.name: you-know-who
entities.description: You-Know-Who is the enemy of Harry, as mentioned by Hermione.

relationships.description: Professor Trelawney stared into Harry's cup.
Professor Trelawney snatched Ron's cup from him.
Professor Trelawney mentioned that Harry has a deadly enemy, You-Know-Who.
